definition: to separate/to partition/to stand or lie between/at a distance from/after or at an interval of
to leave/to part from/to be away from/(in giving distances) from/without (sth)/independent of/one of the Eight Trigrams 八卦[ba1 gua4], symbolizing fire/☲

pinyin: er4 yang3 hua4 tan4 ge2 li2

sentences.english: It is imperative, therefore, that they use whatever resources are available and so should be segregated.
sentences.chinese: 因此，必須讓其使用任何可用的資源，並應對其隔離。

sentences.english: States as well as the federal governments may impose quarantines or may operate quarantine facilities.
sentences.chinese: 隔離規定和隔離操作都有聯邦政府進行。

sentences.english: States as well as the federal governments may impose quarantines or may operate quarantine facilities.
sentences.chinese: 隔離規定和隔離操作都有聯邦政府進行。

sentences.english: I am now a lonely being, disunited from society.
sentences.chinese: 我現在是一個孤獨人，與社會隔離了。

sentences.english: The initial stabilization for a leaking cylinder containing corrosives is isolation in a well-ventilated area.
sentences.chinese: 第一步是把裝有腐蝕劑的鋼瓶隔離在通風良好的區域。

sentences.english: A simple, low - cost, isolated flyback power supply energizes a DVM module.
sentences.chinese: 一個簡單廉價的隔離反激式電源DVM模塊供電。

sentences.english: The new advisory covers several towns northeast of the mandatory exclusion zone.
sentences.chinese: 新提議的疏散區包括了強制隔離區東北的幾個城鎮。

sentences.english: Necklacing was also used to punish members of the black community who were perceived as collaborators with the apartheid regime.
sentences.chinese: 也用在黑人團體中和種族隔離政權勾結的成員身上。
這所學校完全取消種族隔離。

sentences.english: Have you ever dreamed of traveling into an isolated area the access to which is forbidden?
sentences.chinese: 你曾經有過到被禁的隔離地區旅行的夢想嗎？

sentences.english: Isolation strips should be cleared of all inflammable vegetation.
sentences.chinese: 隔離帶上所有易燃的植被應清除。

sentences.english: Autopolyploids are genetically isolated from their parental diploids .
sentences.chinese: 同源多倍體與其親本二倍體在遺傳上相隔離。

sentences.english: The development direction and aim of mercury-free separator paper for battery were summarized.
sentences.chinese: 介紹了無汞鹼錳電池隔離紙的發展方向和目標。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the effect of pulmonary vein isolation on atrial depolarization.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討成功的肺靜脈電隔離對心房除極的影響。

sentences.english: The present invention includes semiconductor constructions having trenched isolation regions.
sentences.chinese: 本發明包含具有帶溝槽隔離區的半導體構造。

sentences.english: Imagine, these lowdown Southern segregationists put the Northern Democrats down.
sentences.chinese: 設想，南方隔離主義的內幕束縛北方民主黨。

definition: to remove makeup/(old) to take off formal dress and ornaments
